title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7406.5 - Maintenance of reportable incident information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7406.5 - Maintenance of reportable incident information

State Regulations
A copy of all completed reports and supplementary
information prepared by OCFS secure facility staff pertaining to reportable
incidents, including copies of all information forwarded to the commission
pursuant to the requirements of this Part, shall be maintained on file as
applicable per OCFS policies and procedures. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7406.5

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter III
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
